titles.title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to delay the termination of the Veterans' Advisory Committee on Education, and for other purposes.
To amend title 38, United States Code, to delay the termination of the Veterans' Advisory Committee on Education, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Benefits.

bill.summary: Extends through 2008 (currently 2003) the Veterans' Advisory Committee on Education. Removes a requirement that the Committee include veterans representing World War II, the Korean conflict era, and the post-Korean conflict era.
